title: Karst API Response
description: Data payload for rendering the Karst App

knacks.description: All of the game's available knacks

category.description: Each knack belongs to a category i.e. The Fundamentals, Hero Stuff

content.description: Full description of the knack in markdown with all details

effect.description: A sub-portion of the content which describes the knack's effect

level.description: A sub-portion of the content which describes the knack's level

notes.description: A sub-portion of the content containing special notes about this knack
